query:
SELECT id, title, content, created_at, updated_at
            FROM notes 
            WHERE to_tsvector('english', title || ' ' || content) @@ plainto_tsquery('english', $1)
            ORDER BY ts_rank(to_tsvector('english', title || ' ' || content), plainto_tsquery('english', $1)) DESC, 
                     updated_at DESC
            LIMIT 100
